decypher this funny thing to get the unlocked trophy's coordinates and ID
create a trophy that gets unlocked by completing this streak of stars
read the path file JSON that contains the rest of the stars
each star is considered a point on a path, so just loop through it in order
make the trophy visible if you collected everything correctly
initialize the streak if this is your first collected star
break the streak if it's the wrong order
break the streak if it's not for the same trophy
add +1 to streak if you got the right star
